summary: Eve Mannering realizes too late that her abusive husband is a philanderer and murderer and seeks protection with her true love, explorer John Beetham.
cast: Warner Baxter|Lois Moran|Gilbert Emery|Claude King|Philip Strange|Boris Karloff|Jamiel Hasson|Peter Gawthorne|John Rogers|Edgar Norton|Frank Finch Smiles|Mercedes De Valasco|E.L. Park|Kathrin Clare Ward
title: Tras la cortina
